title: Strategies for Turning Difficult Clients Into Favorites
description: "If I've got a client with very low emotional intelligence, this is going to make my job as an advisor much more challenging," says Beverly Flaxington, cofounder of The Collaborative, who explains how advisors should engage with these clients.
